Description: Condition: Excellent with almost no signs of wear. Super clean! This G6609TFM Player's Edition Broadkaster is crafted for full-spectrum sound with powerful new Full'Tron pickups and a chambered spruce center block, enhancing overall resonance. Its double cutaway body is crafted out of laminated tiger flame maple, in a beautiful Bourbon Stain gloss finish. The maple neck features a gloss finish, with a comfortable standard "U" shape for extreme comfort along the entire length of the neck. The U.S.-made Full'Tron pickups deliver extreme sonic range with a signature growl, along with that classic Gretsch chime that player's have come to know and love. The guitar also features an anchored Adjusto-Matic bridge with a string-through bigsby.  Features & Technical Specs: Body Wood: Laminated Tiger Flame Maple  Body Color/Finish: Bourbon Stain/Gloss Finish Neck Wood: Maple/Gloss Finish Neck Profile: Standard "U" Shape  Neck Joint: Set Neck Fingerboard Material: Ebony  Fingerboard Inlays: Aged Pearloid Neo-Classic "Thumbnail" Fingerboard Radius: 12" (305mm) Frets: 22 Medium Jumbo Nut: Graph Tech TUSQ XL Nut Width: 1.6875" (42.86mm) Tuners: Gotoh Locking  Scale Length: 24.6" (625mm) Bridge: Anchored Adjusto-Matic with String-Through Bigsby  Pickups: Full'Tron  Controls: Volume 1 (Neck Pickup), Volume 2 (Bridge Pickup), Master Volume, Master Tone, 3-Position Toggle Hardware Finish: Chrome  Case: G6267 Deluxe Hardshell Included Strings: NPS 10-46 Country Of Origin: Japan  Serial Number: JT17082546 Weight: 7.79 lbs. Switching: 3-Position Toggle P1 - Bridge Pickup P2 - Bridge & Neck Pickup P3 - Neck Pickup
Title: Gretsch G6609TFM Broadkaster Bourbon Stain w/Case - Premium Preowned
